Package controller

Class Coordinator

java.lang.Object
controller.Coordinator
public class Coordinator extends Object
The `Coordinator` class is responsible for coordinating the different functionalities of the toy store application. It handles the main menu, loading toys from a file, saving toys to a file, searching for toys, adding new toys to the inventory, and purchasing toys.
